messages.subject: Re: sacrifice
messages.msgSnippet: I don t believe in sacrifice, I do believe we have choices. Pat ... sacrifices... ... isn t ... to read
messages.messageBody:
I don't believe in sacrifice, I do believe we have choices.


Pat

messages.messageBody:
Anyone happen to remember the conversation a few months ago that was
sparked by a comment about how parent's need to make certain sacrifices...
and then others had some really different perspectives about how it isn't
that at all?? I can't find it in the archives, and I'd really like to read
the thread again...

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
